txt.en:
A Burglar likes to trick his foes and treat his friends. Based on your discipline, you treat yourself and your allies with benefits when you land critical hits:

Red Dawn: Nearby allies receive a +10% Devastate Chance for 15 seconds.

Riddermark: Grants a health bubble to nearby allies and their war-steeds for 18 seconds.

Rohirrim: +200 War-steed armour for 24 seconds.
